string.text: {=str_comment_vassal_introduces_self.spanish.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, and I am honored to serve you.
{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.spanish.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served the Spanish for generations.

{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.spanish_honor.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has stood in the Imperial Court and discharged its duties honorably since the first days of the Kingdom.

{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.spanish_mercy.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Though one should not be too proud of one's lineage, I am glad to say that we have always taken seriously our duty to protect the common folk of the Spanish.
{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.spanish_boasting.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Spanish.

{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.spanish_boasting_cruel.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Spanish. The barbarians we have slain, and the glory we have won, is second to none.
